name: Volt
description: Volt is a fearless and charismatic oscilloscope-themed robot who is an esteemed member of the WebtrES club. With a sleek red body color reminiscent of the iconic racing red, Volt stands out from the crowd. Its classic box-shaped design and soldier-like buttons give it a strong and authoritative presence. The red and black screen adds a touch of sophistication and elegance to its appearance. With its top-notch abilities and skills, Volt is always ready to tackle any challenge that comes its way.
